summary: Hard Rock is my very first mod adding new mini-dungeon occupied by bandits located near Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]                                                           [/size][size=6]HARD ROCK[/size]
Hey, this is my first mod, adding a small dungeon ruled by bandits. You can find it near Riverwood.
Please share [b]your thoughts[/b] in comments section, tell me if you have any suggestions or encountered any problems, or simply just want to help me. :) 
Also, big thanks to Bethesda for making such a awesome game and [b]Reza[/b] for encouraging me to start my modder career!
[size=4]Compatibility
[/size]Almost everything, not compatibile with mods adding new objects on Hard Rock Entrace area.
[size=4]Changelog
[/size]1.1 Added 2 new rooms, moved npcs, made some minor improvments.
author: Milek345
